name: DJ Visualizer
description:
Be a DJ! Press keys 1-4 for different sounds!

  • 1 - hype
  • 2 - boom
  • 3 - electronic
  • 4 - beats

You can replace the music files in the data folder with your own music for a customized experience. Just keep the filename the same.

Made in Processing (https://processing.org/)
Music files (c) Loop Catrel (http://sounds.beatport.com/pack/edm-remix-tools/2817)
